clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Trimetazidine is indicated for use in angina pectoris

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Metoclopramide is combined with Trimetazidine
The therapeutic efficacy of Trimetazidine can be decreased when used in combination with Patent Blue
Trimetazidine may increase the vasodilatory activities of Isosorbide mononitrate
